text: Do you think people who have pets live longer than people who don't have pets? Why?
Are there any animals that make you uncomfortable?
Is a dog really man's best friend?
What is the worst possible pet a person could have?
We are now at the point that there are more tigers in captivity in the USA than there are wild tigers in the rest of the world. Is this a measure of preservation? Or is it something else?
It has been said that commercials are the most powerful form of art in the modern age. What are your thoughts on that?
What is art?
Tell us about your favorite artist.
Which does life imitate more - art? Or bad TV?
Art takes many forms ranging from poetry and dance to painting and sculpture. What artistic form do you most enjoy?
Do you have any bad habits? Would you care to share them with us?
What's the best way to break a bad habit?
What habit do you have that you would most like to give up?
Do you have any bad habits that you are actually ok with?
Who is your favorite author? What do you like about their writing?
If your life was a book, what book would it be?
What's your most memorable book from childhood?
Tell us about the scariest story you ever read.
What is your favorite genre of fiction?
Would you rather be a pair of slippers, or a chair?
Would you rather have an awesome talent and never get recognized for it, or become famous for doing something stupid?
Would you rather go bungee jumping or scuba diving?
Would you rather have free Wi-Fi wherever you go or have free coffee whenever you want?
Would you rather have a Lamborghini or a bookshelf with 9000 books?
Would you rather rule the world or live in a world with absolutely no problems at all?
Would you rather live in space or under the sea?
Would you rather be a cow or a chicken?
Would you rather experience the beginning of planet Earth or the end of planet Earth?
Would you rather be able to fly or be invisible?
Which activitives make you lose track of time?
Can you describe your life in a six word sentence?
What does it mean to be human?
What do you have that you cannot live without?
What can money not buy?
Where do you find peace?
How are you pursuing your dreams right now?
What chances do you wish you had taken?
What good comes from suffering?
What makes you weird?
When you have a random hour of free time, what do you usually do?
What is missing in your life?
What are the top three qualities you look for in a friend?
What makes someone a hero?
When did you realize that life is short?
How would you describe your future in three words?
What is your favorite place on earth?
What is the last thing that made you laugh out loud?
What makes life easier?
What confuses you?
How many hours a week do you spend online?
What do you spend the most frivolous amount of money on?
What is the best thing you ever purchased that was under $50?
If you could change your career regardless if you have the talent, what would it be and why?
What is the definition of success to you?
Would you rather change something in the past or find out what happens in the future?
If you could suffer no consequences from eating for a day, what would you eat and why?
What life hack have you done that changed your life that you think would benefit others as well?
At one point in your life did you realize you are no longer a kid and need to be an adult?
What is one thing you do that others think is crazy?
If you had to move 3000 miles away, what one thing would you miss the most?
What's the best decision you ever made?
If you could relive yesterday, what would you do differently?
What is something you don't like to do that you are still really good at?
In one year from today, how do you think your life will be different?
If I gave you $1000 that had to be spent today, what would you buy?
Outside of Toastmasters, what do you love to practice?
What things in life should always be free?
What is something you have always wanted since you were a kid?
What are you an expert at?
What questions do you often ask yourself?
What is your favorite time of the year?
In what way are you your own worst enemy?
What's one downside of the modern day world?
What simple fact do you wish more people understood?
What have you lost interest in recently?
What job would you never do no matter how much it paid?
What music do you listen to that lifts your spirits when you're feeling down?
If there was a movie about your life, what genre(s) would it be?
How would an extra $1000 a month change your life?
When did you not speak up when you should have?
What is your favorite quote?
What was the last time you felt lucky?
Has a dream ever changed your life? If so, what was it?
What's something you recently learned about yourself?
